biotools.summary: Novel regularization scheme over multitask regression , which allows shared sparsity patterns for related inputs and outputs to be optimally estimated.  Such patterns capture multiple related single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) that jointly influence multiple-related expression traits.

bioschemas.name: Structured Input-output Lasso
bioschemas.summary: Novel regularization scheme over multitask regression , which allows shared sparsity patterns for related inputs and outputs to be optimally estimated.  Such patterns capture multiple related single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) that jointly influence multiple-related expression traits.
